metadata.title: CVE-2022-33067 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Lrzip v0.651 was discovered to contain multiple invalid arithmetic shiftsvia the functions get_magic in lrzip.c and Predictor::init inlibzpaq/libzpaq.cpp. These vulnerabilities allow attackers to cause aDenial of Service via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: lrzip package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
zpaq package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
